description:
Men's 160 g, 16.5 microns 100% Merino wool T-shirt. It is especially designed for conditions where you need light and breathable clothes that feel comfortable even though you perspire heavily. The flat seams enhance comfort. Raglan cut sleeves. The T-shirt is extremely light and airy. The T-shirt is suitable for leisure activities and sports.

Local pride with the Valhalla Pure name and a print of one of our favorite activities - hiking in the backcountry!
name: Lasting Merino VPO "1990 Hike the Valhallas" 100% Merino Wool SS T-Shirt - Mens
